response.overview: This video will teach your child: important first words, colors, numbers, favorite objects, familiar phrases and more! The Brainy Baby Learning Library(R) is the pioneer in infant development videos. It is the first video series that can help stimulate cognitive development. Brainy Baby(R) was created to give you child a jump-start on learning and provide a solid foundation in early education.
response.title: Brainy Baby: French
